text: Went for my yearly scaling and polishing with Dr. Charles Tan. He is very professional, gentle, and detail-oriented, making the experience comfortable. The clinic staff are also polite and welcoming. Highly recommend!

Thank you Doctor Jade for her help on my tooth filling, smooth process -> quick and good!
The receptionist is also very friendly and nice. Definitely recommended!

Visited Horizon Dental at Chin Swee Rd on 17 Feb 2025 about 11am.
Dr Jade attended to me. Great Doctor n as a person.Apart from a job well done,(filling), Dr Jade is Very professional, detailed, patient.V need more professional like this in this industry. Dr Jade thank u v v much üôèüèºüòä

Brought my helper for teeth extraction! Dr Cheryl Goh was very helpful and patient. Explained the process very thoroughly before the extraction takes place. And told me the precautions my helper need to take note from now on.(her oral hygiene is really bad). Her assistant and counter staff are also very friendly. Their charges are reasonable too!  Will recommend to friends and family.

DONT WALK IN!!

Please to call in to make appointment before it becomes a disappointment!

They had a renovation and it looks great!

Also did I mention that the pricing is the most reasonable pricing I would say whole Singapore!
